body: At 9th level, whenever you summon a creature, it gains energy resistance 10 against the energy type that matches your elemental bloodline (if it already has such resistance, its resistance increases by +5), and its natural attacks deal an additional 1d6 points of damage of the same energy type. This bloodline power replaces elemental blast.
name: Elementalist Summoning
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Spellcasting Class Options/Sorcerer/Sorcerer Archetypes/Wildblooded/Primal/Bloodline Powers/Elementalist Summoning
